This game is bad, here are the reasons why:
1. most of the guns feel the same... in a first person shooter and the guns that are different are useless
2. the community is awful 
3. this game is balanced only for competitive play so you have to play it competitively to do even somewhat well and that's just not fun
4. the learning curve is is really easy to learn but way to hard to get past being a beginner, this is not how games should be, also this game is praised for having a high skill ceiling even though tf2 a much better game by valve has a way higher skill ceiling than this game.
here is the list of good things in this game:
1. the maps are designed well and look good
2. surfing but you shouldn't praise the game for having it since it wasn't made by the developers or even endorsed by them.
that's it the only thing that this game has that is praise worthy is the maps, this game definitely didn't deserve the award that it got since the updates show no signs of passion nor do they even update very often.
